Mew (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0150: Mewtwo
Pokémon
#0152: Chikorita →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Mew (TCG Pocket).

Mew has been featured on 37 different cards since it debuted as one of the Wizards Black Star Promos of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Mew cards are normally Psychic-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Mew

Mew
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
